Articles.Content:
It's been a while since I played that game.. so bare with me.

I d/l's the KW Release Package (2.6) and cannot figure out which decoupler to use with the heavier SRB's.. (Thor, and Thor II).

I feel like such a newb!!

Does that actually matter?

Use a radial decoupler, and use struts to make sure it stays in place. Decouple once the boosters run out
If you are having issues with booster separation that's what Seprotrons are for.

Sepratrons

Tiny solid boosters that you put radially on your boosters. Activate them at the same time as seperation, and they will (asuming you placed them correctly), push the booster away from the rocket
